Class GUIController

extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for the GUI

    Roli

      changes the title of the window to show the user is an instructor

      Calls the new account handler to create a new account , logs in the account if successful

      Login method receives the name and password of the user trying to log in

      unofollows the current subject , removes it from the users followed subjects list

      removes the current subject , deletes from list of followed subjects for each existing user , deletes the buttons for the subject
